word_mean: 〔复sarcomas或sarcomata〕肉瘤：由类似于胚胎结缔组织的物质构成的肿瘤。该组织由包埋在原纤维或同源物内的密集细胞组成。肿瘤常呈高度恶性。另见melanosarcoma、myxosarcoma、chondro-sarcoma、fibrosarcoma、osteosarcoma及lymphosarcoma等

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek sarkōma, from sarkoun 'become fleshy', from sarx, sark- 'flesh'

entry.def: Sarcoma is one of the two main forms of cancer. It affects tissues such as muscle and bone.

means.word_mean: 1. a usually malignant tumor arising from connective tissue (bone or muscle etc.); one of the four major types of cancer
